about_the_game:
Farming

Build your house, cultivate your greenhouses, raise wild-caught animals, and build your electrical installations. Your base will be the headquarters of your future attacks, as you conquer, you will unlock new skills to improve and expand it.

Conquest

Attack your enemies' bases alone or with up to 4 people. Each base has a new mechanic to understand to conquer it, and offers you new skills to face the next one, or take care of your base.

Exploration

Travel the sea, the mountains, the snow-capped peaks and the deserted islands, hunt animals with a bow or by hand, catch fish and harvest natural resources, study species of birds and fish, find underwater wrecks.

Skills

As you dominate the zones, you will be able to explore new skill areas, hunting, fishing, archery, logging, improving your boat and your sailing skills. You will improve your knowledge of electricity, animal breeding, and of course botany. Your goal here is to master the local flora and its specificities, sensitivity to the sun, temperature, consumption of water, fertilizer, to feed you, your animals or treat yourself.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon RX 460 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970, Radeon RX 580 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Saffron is an open world game of exploration, conquest, farming and navigation. Explore the territories of the Saint-Valentin archipelago alone or with friends by sail and carry out attacks against enemy bases, while building your own, sailing along the land.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
